posts.post_content: Scavenge looks like an ability that wizards worried about. Maybe it was too powerful during playtesting? I can see a few matches wherein a few creatures got a bit too big and flattened the opposing player. All it'd take is one good instance of flying or trample, and [Ring of Kalonia](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ring of Kalonia) gives the latter to a lot of Golgari stuff...
